references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a model that is foundational to many current text-to-image generation models, including the one improved by this paper.
This paper introduces diffusion models, which form the foundation of many modern text-to-image generation models and are directly used by this paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, the pre-trained model that this paper uses and improves upon, thus forming the basis for this research.

references.paper_title: Adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces ControlNet, a method for adding conditional controls to diffusion models that is directly compared to and improved by this paper.

references.paper_title: Humansd: A native skeleton-guided diffusion model for human image generation
references.reason: This paper introduces HumanSD, a method for generating human images from pose data that is directly compared to and improved by this paper.
